participant_1.background:
I am a piano teacher on the side.
I play several instruments.
My father played violin professionally.
I volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.background:
I play the piano and guitar and sing.
My favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
My parents are not very supportive of my dream.
I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work as a custodian to help pay the bills, but I also play the piano, guitar, and sing. My favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
That's awesome! I also play a few instruments, and I love folk music.
Really? That's great! What instruments do you play?
I play the piano, guitar, and violin.
Wow, you're very talented! I'm just a hobbyist, but I love playing music.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to create something with just your own hands.
I agree! It's also a great way to express yourself.
Exactly! I love being able to put my emotions into music.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree! I love playing music whenever I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed.
Me too! It's the best medicine.
I'm glad we both love music! It's a great way to connect with people.
I agree! It's a universal language that can bring people together.
I'm glad we're both musicians! It's nice to meet someone who understands the love of music.
